nodes.documentation:
@title Core contract for Wolsuki. Holds all functions related to any single pool.
 @author Wolsuki (https://www.wolsuki.com)
nodes.name: WolsukiCore

nodes.documentation: @dev BetPlaced event is emitted whenever a player places a bet.
nodes.name: BetPlaced

nodes.documentation: @dev RewardClaimed event is emitted whenever a player claims a reward.
nodes.name: RewardClaimed

nodes.documentation: @dev PoolOpened event is emitted whenever a user opens a pool.
nodes.name: PoolOpened
